articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Serbia's EuroPride will not happen due to threats, says President - ABC News
articles.description: The Serbian President announced the pan-European pride event will not take place in Belgrade this year, citing threats.
articles.content:
Serbia will not allow a pan-European LGBTQ Pride event to take place in Belgrade next month, the President has said, citing threats from right-wing extremists and fears of clashes.

articles.title: Dinosaur remains in Portuguese garden could be Europe’s largest ever find - The Guardian
articles.description: Researchers believe vertebrae and ribs indicate a brachiosaurid sauropod 25 metres long and 12 metres high
articles.content:

articles.author: Oren Liebermann
articles.title: How Ukraine is using resistance warfare developed by the US to fight back against Russia - CNN
articles.description: As the war in Ukraine has passed the six-month mark, US and European officials say Ukraine has successfully used a method of resistance warfare developed by US special operations forces to fight back against Russia and bog down its vastly superior military.
